name: 700c Schwinn Phocus 1500 Men's Road Bike, Silver

reviews.name: 700c Schwinn Phocus 1500 Men's Road Bike, Silver
reviews.reviewText:
I buyed this bike a month ago.
Set up was easy (mainly considering I'm not a specialist...), and took only 30 min.
In 1st ride all gears work OK, and no issues was observed.
The bike rides "smooth" with no sound even in high speed.
In the next oportunity (I'm from Brazil) I will buy another for my wife.
Before I forgot, 25 lbs / frame 58.
reviews.title: Great Bike!!!

reviews.name: 700c Schwinn Phocus 1500 Men's Road Bike, Silver
reviews.reviewText: Great starter level bike. Super easy to assemble. Rides real nice and shifts smooth and slick. Hand grips are very comfortable. All and all a very nice bike.
reviews.title: very good,lite,fast bike

reviews.name: 700c Schwinn Phocus 1500 Men's Road Bike, Silver
reviews.reviewText:
I'm so happy of being bought this bike, for so many reasons.

1st i receive my bike in about 2 days after pay for it,

2nd Assembly the bike that by the way was assembly 80% in advance was simple and enjoyable.

3rd The Speed control is so nice that make me love it just to see it and when i operate it is a pleasure!

4th, to ride my new bike is as enjoyable as it can be.

I cannot recommend enough this product.
reviews.title: The best bike I ever ride!

reviews.name: 700c Schwinn Phocus 1500 Men's Road Bike, Silver
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this online. I put the handlebars on upside down, messed up the rear brakes, took my first ride around the block like this with undereinflated tires. I went to the local bike shop where they laughed at me and charged me $30 to repair what I had done. Once tweaked I now have a Sweet ride and am very happy. Kind regards, Ken Port Orange FlL.
reviews.title: Awesome ride!
